subject: DishNetwork will give you a DVR and an iPod. What do you get from your cable company adf?
body:
adf, did you know that DishNetwork will give you a DVR and an iPod?
Pretty Amazing. What does your Cable Company Give you? A High Bill?

It's TV from Outer Space, and Specials Out of this World
